Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Ah, hello, Link. I should have known we
would run into you here.<sp:0:4:0>We came to investigate the geoglyph in
this region, but the sludge falling from
the sky complicated things.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Fortunately, that muck is gone now, and
our efforts to research the local geoglyph
may resume.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The ancient literature states that the
<clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff> is at the bottom of
a canyon in Hebra.
We believe that it will be integral to our
understanding of the geoglyphs.

Investigating the local geoglyph is still
important, but I would like to find that
temple as soon as possible.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>The ancient literature says that the
<clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff> holds information that
could aid us in finding the geoglyphs.
I propose we start there. We can find the
temple in a canyon in Hebra.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Trouble>There have been reports of a geoglyph in
this area. We plan on taking to the skies
to look for it.
